metadata.title: CVE-2020-15693 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Nim 1.2.4, the standard library httpClient is vulnerable to a CR-LFinjection in the target URL. An injection is possible if the attackercontrols any part of the URL provided in a call (such as httpClient.get orhttpClient.post), the User-Agent header value, or custom HTTP header namesor values.

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
